title: Strengthening AI Practical Competencies: Phenomenological Inquiry for Workplace Experience-Based Competency Development

context.prior_knowledge: Requirement of intermediate theoretical background and practical experience
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can analyze their workplace experiences through a phenomenological lens and describe at least three stages of competency development
Learners can compare peer managers' experiential cases and propose two practical strategies for enhancing organizational learning
Learners can classify the educational significance of mathematics teaching experiences into five categories and post them on a shared platform
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
